languages.text: "Нам надо немедленно выдвигаться к звездной гавани, шаттлы нас здесь не найдут даже при условии стабильной связи. А ее не будет".
"We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
languages.original_text: "Нам надо немедленно выдвигаться к звездной гавани, шаттлы нас здесь не найдут даже при условии стабильной связи. А ее не будет".

traits.locale_text: "We must move out towards the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
"We must move out towards the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
"We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
"We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
"We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."
"We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

languages.text: "Wir müssen sofort zum Raumhafen aufbrechen. Die Shuttles finden uns hier nicht, selbst wenn sich die Verbindung stabilisiert. Was sie nicht tun wird."
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen sofort zum Raumhafen aufbrechen. Die Shuttles finden uns hier nicht, selbst wenn sich die Verbindung stabilisiert. Was sie nicht tun wird."

languages.text: « Nous devons nous rendre immédiatement à l'astroport. Les navettes ne nous trouveront pas ici, même si les canaux de communication se stabilisent. Ce qui n'arrivera pas. »
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons nous rendre immédiatement à l'astroport. Les navettes ne nous trouveront pas ici, même si les canaux de communication se stabilisent. Ce qui n'arrivera pas. »

languages.text: “我们必须立刻出发，前往星港。否则就算通讯恢复了稳定，穿梭机也找不到我们，虽然恐怕通讯不可能恢复。”
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须立刻出发，前往星港。否则就算通讯恢复了稳定，穿梭机也找不到我们，虽然恐怕通讯不可能恢复。”

languages.text: 「すぐにスターポートに向かわなければなりません。たとえ通信リンクが安定したとして、ここで我らを見つけてくれるシャトルはありません。そして安定することもないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: 「すぐにスターポートに向かわなければなりません。たとえ通信リンクが安定しても、ここで私たちを見つけてくれるシャトルはありません。それはないでしょうね」

languages.text: «Debemos salir hacia el puerto estelar de inmediato. Las lanzaderas no nos encontrarán aquí aunque se estabilice el enlace de comunicaciones. Que no lo hará».
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos salir hacia el puerto estelar de inmediato. Las lanzaderas no nos encontrarán aquí aunque se estabilice el enlace de comunicaciones. Que no lo hará».

languages.text: "Derhâl yıldız limanına ulaşmalıyız. Biliyorum, iletişim düzelmez ama diyelim ki düzeldi, mekikler bizi burada bulamaz."
languages.original_text: "We must move out toward the starport at once. The shuttles aren't going to find us here even if the comm link stabilises. Which it won't."

traits.locale_text: "Derhâl yıldız limanına doğru yol almalıyız. Biliyorum düzelmeyecek ama iletişim düzelse bile gemiler gelip bizi buradan almayacak."
